title: @Riot please help. How do you signup for PBE. It just doesn't work
body:
Im crsly trying to signup for this.
I meet the requirements to get in. Aka honor 3 or above
The last time I did something bannable like inting was like a year ago.

My friends who got banned like very recently got their pbe account like a day ago.

I refreshed it like 100 times, and it still doesn't work.

replies.body: There's a [**sticky post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fAy3y263-pbe-is-backwait-wut) explaining the issues with that signup page right now, but essentially it's been overloaded by how many people are trying to signup at the same time. Give it some time to process everyone and you should be able to signup soon.
